entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as muttering and hobbling out of the Defense Against the Dark Arts class. He had difficulty with the curse but was able to throw it off entirely.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as skipping on every alternate step and having much more difficulty with the curse than Harry.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as insisting on putting Harry through his paces four times in a row until he could throw off the curse entirely. He assured Ron that the effects would wear off by lunchtime.

entities.name: defense against the dark arts class
entities.description: The Defense Against the Dark Arts class is mentioned as the context for Harry's and Ron's conversation.

relationships.description: Moody taught Harry in the Defense Against the Dark Arts class.
Moody also taught Ron in the Defense Against the Dark Arts class.
Harry and Ron are described as friends, based on their conversation and interaction with each other.
